mapper.select: select wt_idx, to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') as wt_date, to_char(stime, 'hh24:mi') as stime, to_char(etime, 'hh24:mi') as etime , to_char(nvl(trunc((etime-stime)*24),0))||'시간' as whour , to_char(nvl(trunc((((etime-stime)*24)-(trunc((etime-stime)*24)))*60),0))||'분' as wminute , w.status, wstatus, name from tbl_worktime w join tbl_member m on w.fk_member_idx = m.idx where m.status = 1
mapper.update: update tbl_worktime set stime = sysdate, status = 1 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 0 and fk_member_idx = 3
update tbl_worktime set etime = sysdate, status = 2 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 1 and fk_member_idx = 3
